mapper.select: SELECT DbT5501."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" AS "shinsakaiKaisaiNo", DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" AS "shinseishoKanriNo", DbT5502."shinsakaiOrder" AS "shinsakaiOrder", DbT5503."shinsakaiIinCode" AS "shinsakaiIinCode", DbT5101."koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" AS "koroshoIfShikibetsuCode" FROM rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" AS DbT5501 JOIN rgdb."DbT5502ShinsakaiWariateJoho" AS DbT5502 ON DbT5501."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5502."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" JOIN rgdb."DbT5503ShinsakaiWariateIinJoho" AS DbT5503 ON DbT5501."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = DbT5503."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" JOIN rgdb."DbT5101NinteiShinseiJoho" AS DbT5101 ON DbT5502."shinseishoKanriNo" = DbT5101."shinseishoKanriNo" WHERE DbT5501."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{shinsakaiKaisaiNo} ORDER BY DbT5503."shinsakaiIinCode", DbT5502."shinsakaiOrder"
SELECT * FROM rgdb."DbT5501ShinsakaiKaisaiYoteiJoho" AS DbT5501 WHERE DbT5501."shinsakaiKaisaiNo" = #{介護認定審査会開催番号}
